scenes.description: Performance of 'キラメキライダー☆' (Kirameki Rider☆).
MC section between songs, hyping up the audience for the next performance.
Performance of '電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言' (Den nou Pure Oshi Dai Sengen).
scenes.song_name: 電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言

subtitles.original: キラメキライダー☆
subtitles.english: Kirameki Rider☆

subtitles.original: 君の心が幸せに染まるように
subtitles.english: May your heart be dyed in happiness

subtitles.original: 重ねていくハーモニー
subtitles.english: As our harmonies overlap

subtitles.original: キラメキ纏って
subtitles.english: Adorned with brilliance

subtitles.original: 歌い続けたいな
subtitles.english: I want to keep singing

subtitles.original: 踊り続けたいな
subtitles.english: I want to keep dancing

subtitles.original: そんな願いはわがままでもいいでしょ？
subtitles.english: Is it okay if those wishes are a bit selfish?

subtitles.original: だって楽しすぎて
subtitles.english: Because it's so much fun

subtitles.original: もう止まらない
subtitles.english: I can't stop anymore

subtitles.original: 輝くステージでもっともっと
subtitles.english: On this shining stage, more and more

subtitles.original: いくよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: ずっと！
subtitles.english: Forever!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい 楽しい 愛しい だけじゃ語れない
subtitles.english: Happy, fun, beloved... those words alone can't describe it

subtitles.original: 今も 今も 悩みはあるけれど
subtitles.english: Even now, even now, there are worries, but...

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ 私
subtitles.english: I'm right here

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'm right here

subtitles.original: 君と同じ世界を見つめて
subtitles.english: Gazing at the same world as you

subtitles.original: いくよー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: キラメキライダー☆
subtitles.english: Kirameki Rider☆

subtitles.original: 生まれたてのドキドキを響かせよう
subtitles.english: Let the fresh excitement echo out

subtitles.original: 最高の時間
subtitles.english: The best time

subtitles.original: 最高の仲間と
subtitles.english: With the best friends

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ
subtitles.english: I'm right here

subtitles.original: 見つけてくれたから
subtitles.english: Because you found me

subtitles.original: 君に会いたくてやってきたんだ
subtitles.english: I came here because I wanted to see you

subtitles.original: みんなで歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's all sing together

subtitles.original: 終わらないメロディ
subtitles.english: An endless melody

subtitles.original: キラメキに乗って
subtitles.english: Riding on the brilliance

subtitles.original: キラメキ纏って
subtitles.english: Adorned with brilliance

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 2025年もあと少し！みんな盛り上がってるー？
subtitles.english: Only a little bit of 2025 left! Is everyone hyped up?

subtitles.original: 今回はカウントダウンライブ！
subtitles.english: This is the Countdown Live!

subtitles.original: あれあれー？コメントの熱量なんだか少なくなーい？
subtitles.english: Wait, what? Isn't the comment enthusiasm a bit low?

subtitles.original: まだまだ足りない！コンコンコーン！
subtitles.english: It's not nearly enough! Kon-kon-kon!

subtitles.original: 電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言
subtitles.english: Cyberspace Pure Oshi Grand Declaration

subtitles.original: こんこんこんこん！
subtitles.english: Kon-kon-kon-kon!

subtitles.original: こんこんこんこん！
subtitles.english: Kon-kon-kon-kon!

subtitles.original: 浮気は許しません
subtitles.english: I won't forgive cheating

subtitles.original: 私だけに尽くしてね
subtitles.english: Devote yourself only to me, okay?

subtitles.original: 私だけにひきつけ中
subtitles.english: Keep your focus only on me

subtitles.original: よそ見はヤダヤダ妥協状
subtitles.english: Looking away is a no-no, no compromises!

subtitles.original: チュンチュン 構って
subtitles.english: Tweet-tweet, pay attention to me

subtitles.original: ちょちょちょ 誰もよそ見したら ボンボンボン 滅
subtitles.english: Wait-wait-wait, if anyone looks away, boom-boom-boom, destroyed!

subtitles.original: メロメロ メラップ
subtitles.english: Mellow-mellow melody

subtitles.original: ぷぷぷらっぷ
subtitles.english: Poo-poo-poo rap

subtitles.original: みんなで推しましょ アッププ
subtitles.english: Let's all push together, up-pu-pu

subtitles.original: ふいに歌うから離さないでしょ？
subtitles.english: I'll sing out of the blue, so you won't let go, right?

subtitles.original: よそ見はダメ！本当にイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: No looking away! I really hate it

subtitles.original: いつも見て見て 私待ってる
subtitles.english: Look at me, look at me always, I'm waiting

subtitles.original: あなたが教えてくれる 愛情のセンター
subtitles.english: You're the one who shows me the center of affection

subtitles.original: 私を支える 永遠さ
subtitles.english: It's the eternity that supports me

subtitles.original: ラビラビラヴ 推し抜く時 チュマチュマ
subtitles.english: Lovely-lovely love, when you're a devoted fan, kiss-kiss

subtitles.original: とってもとってもとってもとっても愛してほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to love me very, very, very, very much

subtitles.original: ハッピーハッピーハッピー 最高のキュンキュン
subtitles.english: Happy, happy, happy, the best heart-throbbing

subtitles.original: はっきりはっきりはっきり
subtitles.english: Clearly, clearly, clearly

subtitles.original: ここテンション ピコピコ
subtitles.english: Here, the tension goes beep-beep

subtitles.original: 気持ちのバロメーター超上がる
subtitles.english: My heart's barometer is rising sky-high

subtitles.original: 大好き 大好き 大好き
subtitles.english: I love you, I love you, I love you

subtitles.original: もう本当に本当に本当に本当に 分かってね
subtitles.english: Please, really, really, really, really understand me

subtitles.original: おーいみんな！ここまでついてこれてる？この後もこの調子で行くよー！
subtitles.english: Hey everyone! Are you keeping up? Let's keep this momentum going!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って何で他の子褒めるの？
subtitles.english: Wait a second, why are you praising other girls?

subtitles.original: よそ見はプンプン
subtitles.english: Looking away makes me mad!

subtitles.original: 私以外も気になってるでしょ
subtitles.english: You're interested in others besides me, aren't you?

subtitles.original: ありえないの！ありえない！
subtitles.english: That's unacceptable! Unacceptable!

subtitles.original: パンパン 他の子にちょちょちょだめ
subtitles.english: Clap-clap, no, no, no, not for other girls

subtitles.original: よそ見したよね？嘘マジ無理
subtitles.english: You looked away just now, didn't you? No way, I really can't deal with that

subtitles.original: ピュア落ちしちゃう私をチュンチュン 指切りしてよ 針千本！
subtitles.english: I'll fall for you purely, tweet-tweet, Pinky swear, or you'll swallow a thousand needles!

subtitles.original: 心変わりしたら本当に 拗ねる 怒る 泣いちゃうからね
subtitles.english: If you have a change of heart, I'll really sulk, get mad, and cry, you know?

subtitles.original: 推し変はしてないね？ 私だけに尽くして...
subtitles.english: You haven't changed your bias, right? Devote yourself only to me...

subtitles.original: るー！
だってほら コメントが愛に溢れている
subtitles.english: Because look, the comments are overflowing with love

subtitles.original: 必死のHP 見る見る回復
subtitles.english: My desperate HP is recovering in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: 時空へ満ちたパワーチャージ
subtitles.english: Power charging, filling the space-time

subtitles.original: ごめごめごめ ちょごめごめごめ
subtitles.english: Sorry-sorry-sorry, a little sorry-sorry-sorry

subtitles.original: ラビラビラヴ 推し抜く時 チュマチュマ
subtitles.english: Lovely-lovely love, when you're a devoted fan, kiss-kiss

subtitles.original: いっぱいいっぱいいっぱいいっぱい愛してほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to love me a lot, a lot, a lot, a lot

subtitles.original: ハッピーハッピーハッピー 最高のキュンキュン
subtitles.english: Happy, happy, happy, the best heart-throbbing

subtitles.original: もううっとりうっとりうっとり 分かってね
subtitles.english: Already entranced, entranced, entranced, understand me
